## ✨ Feature

**What to add?**

> e.g. Dark mode support for TimePicker.

**Why?**

> e.g. Consistent UX with app theme.

### ✅ Checklist

- [ ] Feature implemented
- [ ] Tests added
- [ ] Docs updated
